title: Part E
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned: For indicating that E2 < E1

1 point is earned: For a correct justification stating one of the following:

  • the kinetic energy (or energy) is transformed into other forms of energy during the collision (e.g., by reference to heat, internal energy, sound)

  • the kinetic energy is not conserved in an inelastic collision

  • a numerical calculation of the relevant energies
descriptions:

1 point is earned: For a correct justification stating one of the following:

  • the kinetic energy (or energy) is transformed into other forms of energy during the collision (e.g., by reference to heat, internal energy, sound)

  • the kinetic energy is not conserved in an inelastic collision

  • a numerical calculation of the relevant energies
